attributes.action: Make Jeremy Clarkson the new Prime Minister or at least Govenor of Transport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We all know how well Jeremy Clarkson could do if he became Prime Minister.  There was an old version of this petition which has now closed, but there were over 40,000 signatures but that's not enough so please please please sign this.  You have 1 year until the petition closes.  Once you've done it get ALL your friends to do it to!!!  Maybe this time we can get to over 100,000.  Clarkson really could make a great PM,  because of his enthusiasm and his fun personality.  Give him a chance everyone!!!

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
